food.description: Each living survivor consumes 1 food per day

fuel.description: Vehicle consumes 1 fuel per day when traveling

starvationEffects.description: When food reaches 0, each survivor loses 5 HP and group loses 10 morale per day

outOfFuelEffects.description: Without fuel, travel on foot at half speed, morale drops, ambush chance increases 20%

medicineEffect.description: Using medicine heals 25 HP. If Medic present, also cures one injury.

high.description: At 70+ morale, +5% success chance on all choices

low.description: At 30 or below morale, -5% success chance on all choices

food.description: Food warnings at 2 or below (critical), 5 or below (low)

medicine.description: Medicine is always scarce - any amount is valuable

fuel.description: Fuel warnings at 0 (on foot), 2 or below (low)

morale.description: Morale affects success chances and ambush vulnerability

food.notes: Food found in 40% of scavenge encounters

medicine.notes: Medicine only in pharmacies, hospitals, medical sites (20% of encounters)

fuel.notes: Fuel at gas stations, vehicles, military sites (30% of encounters)

ammo.notes: Ammo at police, military, gun stores (25% of encounters)
